TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ChangeRejectedException extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException

Docs.summary: An exception that indicates whether a part has been rejected during composition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError> errors) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of errors that occurred during composition.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a list of composition errors.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ChangeRejectedException>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The message that describes the exception. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed to the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ChangeRejectedException>.
|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the message associated with the component rejection.
Docs.value: The message associated with the component rejection.
